topic.title: How to Force an Odd or Even Number of Pages in a Chapter

body.p: Another use case is to specify a number of pages for a section. Imagine you have a table of contents that follows the cover page and need to have an even number of pages. This way the next chapter would start on an even page.
In your customization css use the -oxy-force-page-count property with an even value:
Supported values for -oxy-force-page-count include: even, odd, end-on-even, end-on-odd, auto, no-force.
